PAPIER MACHE DRY FRUIT BOWL

PAPIER MACHE DRY FRUIT BOWL

Wood and Papier-Mache.

Decorative in its looks and handcrafted in its essence - this serving dry fruit bowl has been handmade by the finest of Kashmiri craftsmen from the remnants of waste paper. The craft of transforming this waste paper, mashing and hardening it and turning it into exquisite pieces of home decor and serving bowl is popularly known as Papier Mache.

View Product Details

The craft of transforming this waste paper, mashing and hardening it and turning it into exquisite pieces of home decor and serving bowl is popularly known as Papier Mache.

PAPIER-MACHE TISSUE BOX.

PAPIER-MACHE TISSUE BOX.

Paper pulp, Papier-Mache.

Papier-Mache is up for the classy you. A beautiful tissue holder crafted in the evergreen charm of Kashmiri Papier-Mache for some art to transpire in something as minute as storing those tissue. The holder is made out of a wooden base over which the Paper-Mache Naqash casts the spell of his brush, drawing from his beautiful imagination. Use it as a piece of classic decor and let it inspire a classy statement for your abode. Keep it at home or use it in your car.
